forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 14 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 20 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle breeze sweeps through Downtown San Francisco as the city basks in mostly sunny skies, the air crisp and invigorating. With a high hovering around 61, it presents a pleasant opportunity to explore the vibrant streets and parks that define this beautiful city. The west wind whips at 14 to 26 mph, carrying with it a briskness that energizes those who step outside, though a light jacket will offer comfort against the chill. The horizon reveals a world unclouded, the Golden Gate Bridge standing majestic, a beacon to wanderers and dreamers alike.

As twilight approaches, the cloud cover will shift to partly cloudy, with temperatures dipping to around 52. The evening invites a quieter pace, perfect for sipping hot coffee at a local café or a leisurely stroll along the waterfront. The marine layer may creep in, wrapping the shoreline with a delicate veil, hinting at the famous fog that can envelop the Bay. For those seeking to savor the evening, layer thoughtfully, as the winds may encourage the wearing of sweaters or light scarves, an attire suited for a San Francisco evening that balances warmth with style. Engage with the world gently, perhaps choosing a quiet gallery visit or an intimate dinner, allowing the city to envelop you in its subtle and enchanting embrace.
